verses.verse: And this<WH2088> is the thing<WH1697> that you shall do<WH6213> to them to hallow<WH6942> them, to minister to me in the priest's<WH3547> office: Take<WH3947> one<WH259> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock,<WH6499> and two<WH8147> rams<WH352> without<WH8549> blemish,<WH8549>

And unleavened<WH4682> bread,<WH3899> and cakes<WH2471> unleavened<WH4682> tempered<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and wafers<WH7550> unleavened<WH4682> anointed<WH4886> with oil:<WH8081> of wheaten<WH2406> flour<WH5560> shall you make<WH6213> them.
And you shall put<WH5414> them into<WH5921> one<WH259> basket,<WH5536> and bring<WH7126> them in the basket,<WH5536> with the bullock<WH6499> and the two<WH8147> rams.<WH352>
And Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> you shall bring<WH7126> to the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and shall wash<WH7364> them with water.<WH4325>

And you shall take<WH3947> the garments,<WH899> and put<WH3847> on Aaron<WH175> the coat,<WH3801> and the robe<WH4598> of the ephod,<WH646> and the ephod,<WH646> and the breastplate,<WH2833> and gird<WH640> him with the curious girdle<WH2805> of the ephod:<WH646>
And you shall put<WH7760> the turban<WH4701> on his head,<WH7218> and put<WH5414> the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> on the turban.<WH4701>
Then shall you take<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and pour<WH3332> it on his head,<WH7218> and anoint<WH4886> him.
And you shall bring<WH7126> his sons,<WH1121> and put<WH3847> coats<WH3801> on them.

And you shall gird<WH2296> them with girdles,<WH73> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and put<WH2280> the bonnets<WH4021> on them: and the priest's<WH3550> office shall be theirs<WH1992> for a perpetual<WH5769> statute:<WH2708> and you shall consecrate<WH3027> Aaron<WH175> and his sons.<WH1121>

And you shall cause a bullock<WH6499> to be brought<WH7126> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation:<WH4150> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall put<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the bullock.<WH6499>
And you shall kill<WH7819> the bullock<WH6499> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> by the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>

And you shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the bullock,<WH6499> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> with your finger,<WH676> and pour<WH8210> all<WH3605> the blood<WH1818> beside<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar.<WH4196>

And you shall take<WH3947> all<WH3605> the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards,<WH7130> and the lobe<WH3508> that is above<WH5921> the liver,<WH3516> and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them, and burn<WH6999> them on the altar.<WH4196>
But the flesh<WH1320> of the bullock,<WH6499> and his skin,<WH5785> and his dung,<WH6569> shall you burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784> without<WH2351> the camp:<WH4264> it is a sin<WH2403> offering.
You shall also take<WH3947> one<WH259> ram;<WH352> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall put<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>
And you shall slay<WH7819> the ram,<WH352> and you shall take<WH3947> his blood,<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH2236> it round<WH5439> about on the altar.<WH4196>
And you shall cut<WH5408> the ram<WH352> in pieces,<WH5409> and wash<WH7364> the inwards<WH7130> of him, and his legs,<WH3767> and put<WH5414> them to his pieces,<WH5409> and to his head.<WH7218>

And you shall burn<WH6999> the whole<WH854> <WH3605> ram<WH352> on the altar:<WH4196> it is a burnt<WH5930> offering to the LORD:<WH3068> it is a sweet<WH5207> smell,<WH7381> an offering made by fire to the LORD.<WH3068>
And you shall take<WH3947> the other<WH8145> ram;<WH352> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall put<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the ram.<WH352>

Then shall you kill<WH7819> the ram,<WH352> and take<WH3947> of his blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it on the tip<WH8571> of the right ear<WH241> of Aaron,<WH175> and on the tip<WH8571> of the right<WH3233> ear<WH241> of his sons,<WH1121> and on the thumb<WH931> of their right<WH3233> hand,<WH3027> and on the great toe<WH931> of their right<WH3233> foot,<WH7272> and sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> on the altar<WH4196> round<WH5439> about.

And you shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> that is on the altar,<WH4196> and of the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and sprinkle<WH5137> it on Aaron,<WH175> and on his garments,<WH899> and on his sons,<WH1121> and on the garments<WH899> of his sons<WH1121> with him: and he shall be hallowed,<WH6942> and his garments,<WH899> and his sons,<WH1121> and his sons'<WH1121> garments<WH899> with him.

Also you shall take<WH3947> of the ram<WH352> the fat<WH2459> and the rump,<WH451> and the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards,<WH7130> and the lobe<WH3508> above the liver,<WH3516> and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them, and the right<WH3233> shoulder;<WH7785> for it is a ram<WH352> of consecration:<WH4394>

And one<WH259> loaf<WH3603> of bread,<WH3899> and one<WH259> cake<WH2471> of oiled<WH8081> bread,<WH3899> and one<WH259> wafer<WH7550> out of the basket<WH5536> of the unleavened<WH4682> bread that is before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068>

And you shall put<WH7760> all<WH3605> in the hands<WH3709> of Aaron,<WH175> and in the hands<WH3709> of his sons;<WH1121> and shall wave<WH5130> them for a wave<WH8573> offering before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>

And you shall receive<WH3947> them of their hands,<WH3027> and burn<WH6999> them on the altar<WH4196> for a burnt<WH5930> offering, for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> it is an offering made by fire to the LORD.<WH3068>

And you shall take<WH3947> the breast<WH2373> of the ram<WH352> of Aaron's<WH175> consecration,<WH4394> and wave<WH5130> it for a wave<WH8573> offering before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> and it shall be your part.<WH4490>

And you shall sanctify<WH6942> the breast<WH2373> of the wave<WH8573> offering, and the shoulder<WH7785> of the heave<WH8641> offering,<WH8641> which<WH834> is waved,<WH5130> and which<WH834> is heaved<WH7311> up, of the ram<WH352> of the consecration,<WH4394> even of that which<WH834> is for Aaron,<WH175> and of that which<WH834> is for his sons:<WH1121>

And it shall be Aaron's<WH175> and his sons'<WH1121> by a statute<WH2706> for ever<WH5769> from the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> for it is an heave<WH8641> offering:<WH8641> and it shall be an heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> from the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of their peace<WH8002> offerings, even their heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> to the LORD.<WH3068>
And the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> of Aaron<WH175> shall be his sons'<WH1121> after<WH310> him, to be anointed<WH4888> therein, and to be consecrated<WH4390> <WH3027> in them.

And that son<WH1121> that is priest<WH3548> in his stead<WH8478> shall put<WH3847> them on seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> when<WH834> he comes<WH935> into<WH413> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> to minister<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place.
And you shall take<WH3947> the ram<WH352> of the consecration,<WH4394> and seethe<WH1310> his flesh<WH1320> in the holy<WH6918> place.<WH4725>

And Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the ram,<WH352> and the bread<WH3899> that is in the basket <WH5536>by the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>

And they shall eat<WH398> those things with which<WH834> the atonement<WH3722> was made, to consecrate<WH3027> and to sanctify<WH6942> them: but a stranger<WH2114> shall not eat<WH398> thereof, because<WH3588> they are holy.<WH6944>

And if<WH518> ought of the flesh<WH1320> of the consecrations,<WH4394> or of the bread,<WH3899> remain<WH3498> to the morning,<WH1242> then you shall burn<WH8313> the remainder<WH3498> with fire:<WH784> it shall not be eaten,<WH398> because<WH3588> it is holy.<WH6944>

And thus shall you do<WH6213> to Aaron,<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> according to all<WH3605> things which<WH834> I have commanded<WH6680> you: seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shall you consecrate<WH3027> them.

And you shall offer<WH6213> every day<WH3117> a bullock<WH6499> for a sin<WH2403> offering for atonement:<WH3725> and you shall cleanse<WH2398> the altar,<WH4196> when you have made an atonement<WH3722> for it, and you shall anoint<WH4886> it, to sanctify<WH6942> it.

Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> you shall make<WH6213> an atonement<WH3722> for the altar,<WH4196> and sanctify<WH6942> it; and it shall be an altar<WH4196> most<WH6944> holy:<WH6944> whatever<WH3605> touches<WH5060> the altar<WH4196> shall be holy.<WH6944>
Now<WH6258> this<WH2088> is that which<WH834> you shall offer<WH6213> on the altar;<WH4196> two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> day<WH3117> by day<WH3117> continually.<WH8548>
The one<WH259> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> in the morning;<WH1242> and the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> at<WH996> even:<WH6153>

And with the one<WH259> lamb<WH3532> a tenth<WH6241> deal of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with the fourth<WH7253> part of an hin<WH1969> of beaten<WH3795> oil;<WH8081> and the fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196> for a drink<WH5262> offering.

And the other<WH8145> lamb<WH3532> you shall offer<WH6213> at even,<WH6153> and shall do<WH6213> thereto according to the meat offering<WH4503> of the morning,<WH1242> and according to the drink<WH5262> offering thereof, for a sweet<WH5207> smell,<WH7381> an offering made by fire to the LORD.<WH3068>

This shall be a continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering throughout your generations<WH1755> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> where<WH834> <WH8033> I will meet<WH3259> you, to speak<WH1696> there<WH8033> to you.
And there<WH8033> I will meet<WH3259> with the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and the tabernacle shall be sanctified<WH6942> by my glory.<WH3519>

And I will sanctify<WH6942> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and the altar:<WH4196> I will sanctify<WH6942> also both Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> to minister to me in the priest's<WH3547> office.
And I will dwell<WH7931> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and will be their God.<WH430>

And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> their God,<WH430> that brought<WH3318> them forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> that I may dwell<WH7931> among<WH8432> them: I am the LORD<WH3068> their God.<WH430>
